name: White Bean Hummus With Tahini and Coriander
description: Coriander seeds add a welcome aroma to this white bean dip, rich with tahini and bright with lemon juice. The miso paste is optional, but it gives the mellow white beans a nice savory depth.
keywords: cannellini beans, miso paste, tahini, side dish, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 (15-ounce) can white cannellini beans, rinsed and drained
5 tablespoons fresh lemon juice (from 1 large lemon)
2 teaspoons coriander seeds, coarsely ground, or 1 1/2 teaspoons ground coriander

recipeInstructions.text: Pulse the garlic in a food processor until minced.

Scrape the bowl and add the beans, tahini, lemon juice, coriander, miso (if using) and 1 teaspoon salt. Pulse until smooth, scraping the bowl occasionally. With the machine running, add the olive oil. Season to taste with salt.
